sentences.en: Any minute now, that phone is going to ring.
George struggled wildly, going under and resurfacing at regular intervals.
sentences.cn: 乔治疯狂地挣扎，不断在水面上浮浮沉沉。

sentences.en: He returned to the airport to find his car alarm going off.
sentences.cn: 他回到机场时听到自己的汽车报警器响了。

sentences.en: He sees himself going right to the top of the tree.
sentences.cn: 他预见自己在同行中将无人可及。

sentences.en: His going will be no great loss to the company.
sentences.cn: 他的离去对公司来说并不算多大的损失。

sentences.en: I didn't realize how heavy that shopping was going to be.
sentences.cn: 我没想到买的东西会有多沉。

sentences.en: I no longer have any objection to your going to see her.
sentences.cn: 我不会再因为你去见她而不高兴。

sentences.en: It's an uphill battle but I think we're going to win.
sentences.cn: 虽然这是一场艰苦的斗争，但我相信我们会取得胜利。

sentences.en: Officers were going to retake sectors of the city.
sentences.cn: 军官们打算重新夺回该市的防御区。

sentences.en: She's going to be fine. She always was pretty strong.
sentences.cn: 她会好的。她一直都很强壮。

sentences.en: Sometimes things don't turn out the way we think they're going to.
sentences.cn: 有时事情并不像我们认为的那样发展。

sentences.en: South Africa was going through a period of irreversible change.
sentences.cn: 南非正在经历一场不可逆转的变革。

sentences.en: That's about half the going price on world oil markets.
sentences.cn: 那大约是世界石油市场上现行价位的一半。

sentences.en: The child is six, going on seven years of age.
sentences.cn: 这个孩子现在六岁，快到七岁了

sentences.en: The one thing I look forward to is going punting in Cambridge.
sentences.cn: 我期盼的一件事就是在剑桥乘坐平底船畅游。

sentences.en: There is no going back to the life she had.
sentences.cn: 她无法再回到从前的生活。

sentences.en: They were going to sail around the little island, against the tide.
sentences.cn: 他们打算绕着小岛逆潮航行。

sentences.en: We're going to go home and nurse our colds.
sentences.cn: 我们打算回家调养感冒。

words.tran_cn: 动态物；离去的人；常去…的人；有进取心的人
流行的；进行中的；现存的
行为；离去；工作情况；地面状况

phrases.tran_cn: 随和；好相处的；从容不迫的

trans.tran_cn: 活着的，现在的，进行中的，营业中的，现行的，流行中的
trans.tran_en: The going rate or the going salary is the usual amount of money that you expect to pay or receive for something

trans.tran_cn: 出行，离去，出发，行为，工作情况
trans.tran_en: the act of leaving a place
